snippet: Martin Scorsese described former President Bill Clinton, who is cooperating with the film, as “a towering figure who remains a major voice in world issues.”
abstract: Martin Scorsese described former President Bill Clinton, who is cooperating with the film, as “a towering figure who remains a major voice in world issues.”
lead_paragraph: Martin Scorsese described former President Bill Clinton, who is cooperating with the film, as “a towering figure who remains a major voice in world issues.” ArtsBeat has more on the new documentary.

headline.main: Bill Clinton Documentary, Directed by Scorsese, Coming to HBO
